queries.query: large ooze that causes debilitating disease and thrives in decay
queries.variant: big ooze that thrives in rotting environments and spreads debilitating diseases

queries.query: monster with thick slime that has a foul smell and can climb walls
queries.variant: creature covered in thick sludge that emits a putrid odor and can scale vertical surfaces

queries.query: creature with high hit points and low AC that infects its foes
queries.variant: monster with a lot of HP and a weak Armor Class that spreads disease to its enemies

queries.query: menacing ooze with necrotic energy and the ability to inflict bog rot
queries.variant: threatening ooze creature associated with necrotics that can cause bog rot disease

queries.query: swarm creature that occupies spaces and has powerful bite attacks
queries.variant: swarming monster that can share space with others and delivers deadly bites
